name: chat-websocket
description: This project is a real-time chat application built using WebSocket technology. It enables users to communicate instantly through text messages within a web-based interface. The chat application leverages WebSocket's bidirectional communication capabilities to facilitate low-latency and efficient message exchange between connected clients. Users can join chat rooms, send messages, view message history, and interact with other participants in real-time. The project incorporates server-side and client-side components to manage WebSocket connections, handle message routing, and maintain chat state. It showcases the power of WebSocket technology in building responsive and interactive web applications.
author: montyaction
